name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Framework**, and **Spring Data JPA**, with a solid understanding of **Hibernate** and **PostgreSQL** for robust backend development. Skilled in **CI/CD**, using tools like **Gradle** for efficient project setups and deployment, and experienced with **Jira** for agile project management.
Though primarily focused on Java, I have gained cross-technology knowledge in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with hands-on experience in frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
I have also built AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and real-time processing, while implementing compliance-driven development that aligns solutions with regulatory standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. With a strong foundation in MLOps, I have focused on model training and orchestration using tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**.
